plugins.name: fetch_client_menu
plugins.description: Shows a menu to select and fetch a window to your active workspace.

plugins.name: layout_center
plugins.description: A workspace layout where one window is centered and maximized while others are in the background.

plugins.name: magnify
plugins.description: Toggles zooming of viewport or sets a specific scaling factor.

plugins.name: menubar
plugins.description: Improves multi-monitor handling of the status bar and restarts it on crashes.

plugins.name: monitors
plugins.description: Allows relative placement and configuration of monitors.

plugins.name: scratchpads
plugins.description: Makes your applications into dropdowns & togglable popups.

plugins.name: shift_monitors
plugins.description: Moves workspaces from monitor to monitor (carousel).

plugins.name: shortcuts_menu
plugins.description: A flexible way to make your own shortcuts menus & launchers.

plugins.name: system_notifier
plugins.description: Opens streams (eg: journal logs) and triggers notifications.

plugins.name: toggle_special
plugins.description: Toggle switching the focused window to a special workspace.

plugins.name: wallpapers
plugins.description: Handles random wallpapers at regular intervals, with support for rounded corners and color scheme generation.

plugins.name: workspaces_follow_focus
plugins.description: Makes non-visible workspaces available on the currently focused screen.

plugins.name: expose
plugins.description: Exposes all windows for a quick 'jump to' feature.

plugins.name: lost_windows
plugins.description: Brings lost floating windows (which are out of reach) to the current workspace.

plugins.name: fcitx5_switcher
plugins.description: A plugin to auto-switch Fcitx5 input method status by window class/title.

plugins.name: pyprland
plugins.description: Internal built-in plugin allowing caching states and implementing special commands.

plugins.name: toggle_dpms
plugins.description: Toggles the DPMS status of every plugged monitor.
